survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding the purchase of organic food products.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase organic food products?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase organic food products?

questions.question_text: Which types of organic food products do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a broader range of preferences.

script.question_text: Which types of organic food products do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase organic food products?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button but include an 'Other' option for open-ended responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase organic food products?

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when purchasing organic food products.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when purchasing organic food products.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of organic food products in your local grocery stores?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of organic food products in your local grocery stores?
